#TP titanic

```{r}
library(carData)
df<-TitanicSurvival
summary(df)
```




```{r}
plot(df$survived~df$sex, col=c("orange","lightgreen"))
plot(df$survived~df$passengerClass)
```



```{r}
plot(df$age~df$survived)
```
